original: 因其妹進宮而入朝，時任大將軍，任命盧植、皇甫嵩、董卓為主將，且大舉如劉表、袁紹等人才，權傾朝野。
text: Because his sister entered the palace and entered the court, he was a general at that time, appointed Lu Zhi, Huang Fusong, and Dong Zhuo as the main generals, and a large number of talents such as Liu Biao, Yuan Shao, etc., power in the court.
